roleset.name: emit liquid
roleset.note: SPOUT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'spout' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 43.4. (from spout.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: metaphorical liquid
example.text: There are moments in this ``Summerfolk'' when the characters populating the vast multilevel country house (which looks like a parody of Frank Lloyd Wright and is designed by Victoria Petrovich) spout philosophic bon mots with the self-conscious rat-a-tat-tat pacing of ``Laugh In.''
example.arg: the characters populating the vast multilevel country house (which looks like a parody of Frank Lloyd Wright and is designed by Victoria Petrovich)
with the self-conscious rat-a-tat-tat pacing of ``LaughIn

roleset.name: say flippantly or quickly, phrasal
roleset.note: SPOUT_OFF-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on Call Home. No VNcls. (from spout.02-v)

example.name: with arg1
example.text: Anyway so I spouted my mouth off

example.name: args 0, 1, 3 and GOL
example.text: That scum-sucking Dawi Zooter-something spouted his mouth off to them about working for Mumbleburg.

example.name: args 0 and 1
example.text: he spouted off that it was no doubt some disgruntled Tea Party guy.
example.arg: that it was no doubt some disgruntled Tea Party guy
